org.zeromq.jzmq

Class UdpSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zeromq.jzmq.UdpSocket

  • public class UdpSocket
extends Object
    Socket for sending UDP messages.

    This class was adapted from ZreUdp in the Jyre project.

    • Constructor Summary

        Parameters:
